title: Client Crashed, had to remake, lost LP
body:
My client crashed in the last game i tried to play on a ranked game and i lost LP, i'm really disheartended cause i wanted to play and i was prepared but then boom, client crashed its really stupid and i feel like i just got cheated.

Edit: My friend was streaming at the time, i was in the stream with him when it happened. I lost 19 LP

replies.body: It sucks having a technical issue during a ranked game, and I'd like to help with whatever is causing that crash to happen.  Were you getting any error messages?  What was happening exactly?  Let me know so I can look deeper into this!

It gives me a connection error, something like "Couldn't connect to the game server" or something and then it says to try again so i do but that doesn't work and causes me to have to restart my entire client, in addition to that i have to go to my task  manager and end the process cause it will run in the background and still count me as in game if i don't so we can't remake.
